top_categories.workout_context: Wörthersee Gravel Race rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Wörthersee Gravel Race’s austrian alps, european gravel demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Wörthersee Gravel Race when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
Racing Wörthersee Gravel Race isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Wörthersee Gravel Race. Make this intensity feel like home.
Wörthersee Gravel Race’s austrian alps gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
Wörthersee Gravel Race’s austrian alps gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Wörthersee Gravel Race’s 6,000ft of climbing demands seated and standing versatility — the ability to change climbing style as gradient and fatigue dictate.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Wörthersee Gravel Race — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Every session at Wörthersee Gravel Race intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Wörthersee Gravel Race — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Wörthersee Gravel Race — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on austrian alps gravel.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Wörthersee Gravel Race’s 75 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at Wörthersee Gravel Race. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Wörthersee Gravel Race requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on austrian alps gravel to build confidence. Expect: austrian alps, european gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Over Under to prepare you for 75 miles of austrian alps gravel in Wörthersee, Austria.
